price: dájúdájú Mo máa fi ìwọ àti gbogbo àwọn tó bá tẹ̀lé ọ nínú wọn kún inú iná Jahanamọ.”
arabic: لَأَمۡلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنكَ وَمِمَّن تَبِعَكَ مِنۡهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: la-amla-anna jahannama minka wamimman tabiʿaka min'hum ajmaʿīna
